mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_coupon (user_id, coupon_id, validate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{couponId}, #{validate})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_coupon SET is_used = "used", use_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_user_coupon SET is_used = "expired" WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.coupon_id, u.publish_time, u.use_time, u.validate, u.is_used, c.name, c.type FROM t_user_coupon as u INNER JOIN t_coupon as c ON u.coupon_id = c.id WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.coupon_id, u.publish_time, u.validate, u.is_used, c.name, c.type FROM t_user_coupon as u INNER JOIN t_coupon as c ON u.coupon_id = c.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.is_used = "not used" ORDER BY u.publish_time DESC

SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.coupon_id, u.publish_time, u.use_time, u.validate, c.name, c.type FROM t_user_coupon as u INNER JOIN t_coupon as c ON u.coupon_id = c.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.is_used = "used" ORDER BY u.use_time DESC

SELECT id FROM t_user_coupon WHERE
validate < str_to_date(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ;
